SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Client.Connection

Interface ClientConnectionHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientConnectionHandlerRMI, ClientConnectionHandlerSOCKET
public interface ClientConnectionHandler extends Remote
This interface is used to send messages to the server and execute messages received from the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    executeMessage(ToClientMessage message)
    Executes a message This method is called by ServerConnectionHandlerRMI to execute a message on the client side
    boolean
    ping()
    Responds to an RMI ping from the server.
    void
    sendMessage(ToServerMessage message)
    Sends a message to the server

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(ToServerMessage message) throws IOException
      Sends a message to the server
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      Throws:
      IOException - when the message can't be sent

    • executeMessage

      void executeMessage(ToClientMessage message) throws RemoteException
      Executes a message This method is called by ServerConnectionHandlerRMI to execute a message on the client side
      Parameters:
      message - the message to execute
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the message can't be executed

    • ping

      boolean ping() throws RemoteException
      Responds to an RMI ping from the server. This method is called by ServerConnectionHandlerRMI to check if its clients are still connected.
      Returns:
      true if the RMI client is still connected. If it's not connected, a RemoteException is thrown. False is returned if the client is not an RMI client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - like all RMI stuff
